data.what_is: Green Leads delivers pay-for-performance demand generation services that drive greater revenue for enterprise-level b2b software and technology companies in North America and Europe. Clients receive the highest level of introductory or qualified b2b appointment setting, lead nurturing, market surveys and list builds
data.product_description: 360i is an award-winning digital marketing agency that drives results for Fortune 500 marketers through insights, ideas and technologies.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about 360i?
su practicidad,su empleabilidad y la facil interfaz que emplea para su uso, realmente es muy facil e intuitiva, la experiencia del manejo comun del usuario es muy apreciada

What do you dislike about 360i?
Su tamano, se debe contar con un espaco amplio

Recommendations to others considering 360i:
disminuir su tamano sin afectar su funcionalidad

What problems is 360i solving and how is that benefiting you?
Problemas de impresion, de scaneado, en fin facilita mucho el manejo de material fisico, al ser de tan facil uso, hace que la experiencia sea super agradable con una muy buenas referencia a nivel de usuario

reviewer.reviewer_job_title: Coordinador Centro de atencion al usuario

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about 360i?
360i is the leader in providing marketing solutions and has demonstrated why. In working with their products I have been able to find my target audience easier and work to properly meet the needs of my organization

What do you dislike about 360i?
There is very little to dislike about the product. Some minor bugs, but that is to be expected.

What problems is 360i solving and how is that benefiting you?
360i is the leader in providing marketing solutions and has demonstrated why. In working with their products I have been able to find my target audience easier and work to properly meet the needs of my organization

What do you like best about 360i?
Their way of understanding the info the comapny has and then processing it with their tools to get insigts. We have used several tools for segmentation etc. Its great tool.

What do you dislike about 360i?
They can be a bit more faster on the TAT. I think that is the one thing that I dealth with. They could also make the solution offering a bit more easier and connected.

Recommendations to others considering 360i:
Please give it a try. They will be really helpful to bring insights and strategy to go with it.

What problems is 360i solving and how is that benefiting you?
360i has helped me and my company understand the insights to our customer base, existing and potential. They have simple yet effective tool to make things easy and usable.

Describe the project or task 360i helped with:
use For digital marketing to help with acquisition

What do you like best about 360i?
Great with designing communications on digital

What do you dislike about 360i?
I don't like the fact that it doesn't upload

Recommendations to others considering 360i:
Use 360i as it's a powerful tool to help evaluate customer interactions with your company

What problems is 360i solving and how is that benefiting you?
Business analytics

Describe the project or task 360i helped with:
I collaborated for a small project in 2015 with 360i. It was a wonderful experience. I think 360i doesn't need any word of mouth - and has all the laurels awarded to them to prove their worth.

What do you like best about 360i?
I think their branding strategies are utmost. They have been doing great - and I wish to have more help from them in the near future.

What do you dislike about 360i?
Nothing as such - I look forward to more/additional services from them in the future - but nothing went wrong to dislike.

What problems is 360i solving and how is that benefiting you?
We wanted to catch some eyeballs for our branding - they were of great help for it back then.

Describe the project or task 360i helped with:
360i is a great company for all SEO and digital needs. They are great with paid search, Amazon marketing, keyword enhancement, and social.

What do you like best about 360i?
The creative-ness of the agency. They have a great team working with out of the box features to boost our products and brands to new consumers.

What do you dislike about 360i?
The price can get quite steep for a young start-up brand

Recommendations to others considering 360i:
Be ready to pay. Big agencies like this cost big dollars. However, sometimes the ROI is there and it makes total sense.

Describe the project or task 360i helped with:
Our company recently used 360i for social media and mobile marketing. It was quick, seamless and very efficient to use. I found it to be both user friendly and useful.

What do you like best about 360i?
I loved the ease of use and how user friendly it was. I think its a high quality software that went above and beyond our expectations.

What do you dislike about 360i?
Nothing! I would not change a thing. I was very pleased with my experience.

Recommendations to others considering 360i:
Try this software and you wont regret it. Easy, efficient and user friendly.

Describe the project or task 360i helped with:
It is a search engine marketing and optimization company but also has social media marketing programs. Its main focus and utility is marketing for our company

What do you like best about 360i?
I like how creative some of the social media programs are. They provide efficent eye-catching solutions for our company.

What do you dislike about 360i?
I do not like how pricey some of the packages can become.

Describe the project or task 360i helped with:
Helped with search engine marketing as well as social media marketing campaigns.

What do you like best about 360i?
I really enjoyed being able to work with a lot of experts from differing fields. The platform is very user friendly and high quality.

What do you dislike about 360i?
I couldn't really find anything that I disliked about working with 360i.

initial_reviews.review_title: award-winning agency that helps brands capitalize on change
initial_reviews.review_content:
Describe the project or task 360i helped with:
It's a great way to brand our company to spread the word about how we can improve transportation. As part of an integrated marketing campaign and brand refresh, we are able to show the company's trucks with a sleek, modern look that conveyed its progressive approach to business.

What do you like best about 360i?
The user friendly program makes it easy to use even for new hires.  Data and Insights are at the core of all our planning, buying, and optimizing efforts

What do you dislike about 360i?
There is nothing I dislike about the service

Describe the project or task 360i helped with:
Quote on launching new application new website launch

What do you like best about 360i?
I like working with knowledgeable people.

What do you dislike about 360i?
I dont like agency pricing structure or when the offer everything under one roof. It means they dont focus enough on one

Recommendations to others considering 360i:
Explore several options and dont place all marketing initiatives in one agency

Describe the project or task 360i helped with:
Happy to say we have completed implementing our services with 360i and they are already providing us with ROI.

What do you like best about 360i?
The team that we work with is full of individuals that Took the time to understand our business and how they could best help us related to our industry, not just arbitrarily.

What do you dislike about 360i?
Projects can take a little longer because of the amount of people on our team but it also makes the idea generation that much stronger.

Recommendations to others considering 360i:
Allow them to run with it, per say. They will take the time and put in the effort to understand your business.

Describe the project or task 360i helped with:
I found them to be intelligent, efficient and team players.

What do you like best about 360i?
Their ability to jump in and be creative, take risks.

What do you dislike about 360i?
The "that's impossible" attitude that can get in the way of greatness

Describe the project or task 360i helped with:
I worked with 360i in my previous role as Fossil's leading marketing agency. Out of all the agencies I've partnered with throughout my career, 360i is one of the most impressive and is well-staffed with experts that specialize in a multitude of different marketing verticals.

What do you like best about 360i?
Having the ability to work with a great team of experts in different marketing fields was definitely one of my favorite aspects of working with 360i

What do you dislike about 360i?
Since our 360i team as primarily located in the New York City area, it was difficult to schedule face to face time with them. Having a partner that's local to the market of the client is beneficial and helps product more efficient work

Describe the project or task 360i helped with:
Made it easier for the group to share files and make edits without any problems

What do you like best about 360i?
Easy to use, everyone is able to get in and make updates

What do you dislike about 360i?
I don't have any problem with it. Nothing to share

Describe the project or task 360i helped with:
It's a really good digital marketing Services, I highly recommend

What do you like best about 360i?
Quality of the work and great plan to achieve our goal

What do you dislike about 360i?
I don't find any bad things, I really love their service
